metadata.title: CVE-2020-8165 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnernerability exists in rails <5.2.4.3, rails < 6.0.3.1 that can allow an attacker to unmarshaluser-provided objects in MemCacheStore and RedisCacheStore potentiallyresulting in an RCE.

criterions.comment: rails package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
